eventType.comment: event name to use to log to .json files

SenseOptions.comment: lets you set what to sense

StreamEnables.comment: lets you set what to stream

Sense.commentTDChannelDefinitions: No more than two channels can be on a single bore. When configuring, channels on first bore will always be first. Can only have sampling rates of: 250, 500, and 1000 (Hz) or disable it by setting IsDisabled to true
Sense.commentFilters: Stage one low pass(Lpf1) can only be: 450, 100, or 50 (Hz). Stage two low pass(Lpf2) can only be: 1700, 350, 160, or 100 (Hz). High pass(Hpf) can only be: 0.85, 1.2, 3.3, or 8.6 (Hz), Inputs[ anode(positive), cathode(negative) ]

FFT.commentFFTParameters: FFT Size can be: 64, 256, or 1024 samples, Hanning window load can be: 25, 50, or 100 (%), channel is for the fft channel must be between 0-3 and time domain must be enabled for that channel

Sense.commentPower: each power band can be set from 0-250hz, 2 pos bands per channel. Ex: ChNPowerBandN:[lower, upper]

Accelerometer.commentAcc: Can be 4,8,16,32,64Hz or set SampleRateDisabled to true for disabled

Misc.commentMiscParameters: stream rate can be 30-100 by tens and is in ms; LoopRecordingTriggersState can be 0-8 or can be disabled by changing IsEnabled to false; Bridging can be 0 = None, 1 = Bridge 0-2 enabled, 2 = Bridge 1-3 enabled
